name: SLOTH 2009
description: SLOTH was originally released in 2006. In 2008, map03 was modified and released as FLANAGAN. In 2009, map04 was modified and released as LOINK. Now, in late 2009, map02/map03/map04 have been slightly modified, in the spirit of the original SLOTH, and released as SLOTH 2009.
